description.narrative: The project will (i) continue the phased rehabilitation of Toktogul hydroelectric power plant (HPP) by replacing two of the four existing generator and turbine units and associated auxiliary equipment; (ii) implement a business process improvement project for the main generation company, open joint-stock company Electric Power Plants (EPP); (iii) prepare an asset inventory and revaluation for the seven power companies, and Bishkekteploset (heat and hot water distribution company); and (iv) prepare a power sector master plan to include a due diligence study for the rehabilitation of Uch Kurgan HPP. The project will increase domestic energy supply and international electricity trade, improve asset management and sector planning, and strengthen sector operational performance.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
EPP DSCR improved from 0.25 in 2014 to at least 1.3 in 2023.
Efficiency of Toktogul units 2 and 4 increased by 2.5 percentage points-from 90% in 2014 to 92.5 % in 2023
EPP debt-equity ratio improved from 65:35 in 2014 to 70:30 in 2025
